price: Ɔsoro ne asaase so akoradeε safoa wͻ no, Ɔbae N’adom no mu ma obi a Ɔpε, εna Ɔsusu nso (ma obi a Ɔpε). Nokorε sε Ɔne biribiara ho Nimdefoͻ.
arabic: لَهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lahu maqālīdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru innahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
